Searching for Specific Text

When you do a comparison with Visual Diff, you can search for specified text in any pane.

To perform a search:

  1. In the Visual Diff window, click the pane that contains the file.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • Select Search > Find from the menu bar.

    • Click the Find button on the toolbar. The Find dialog opens.

  3. Enter the text for which you want to search in the Find what text box.

  4. (Optional) Select Match case for a case-sensitive search.

  5. Select Up or Down as the direction for the search.

  6. Click Find Next.
